BH/Blastrage/Zergling/Scorponok


BH looks around for whom he should fire upon. Prowl looks like a 
target. BH fires 50 lasers from his 2 semi-automatic laser guns 
towards prowl. He fired 2 Optic blast at Prowl's Right foot.


Blastrage fires the skimmer's 10x Gernade launcher at Iron Raptor. He 
fires 3 Optic Blast at Iron Raptor's Chest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Zergling Sees the skimmer, that Blastrage is piloting. He jumps up 
slashing at the skimmer

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scorponok places Dark mouse on a table. "I need you to be unconsis,
So 
hear we go." Scorponok gives Darkmouse some pills to knock her out.
